import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FiArrowLeft } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { Map, TileLayer, Marker} from 'react-leaflet' import api from '../../services/api'; import axios from 'axios'; import './styles.css'; import logo from '../../assets/logo.svg'; interface Item{ id: number; title: string; image_url: string; } interface IBGEUFResponse{ sigla: string } const CreatePoint = () =>{ const [items, setItems] = useState([]); const [ufs, setUfs] = useState([]); useEffect(() =>{ api.get('items').then(response => { setItems(response.data); }) },[]); useEffect(() =>{ axios.get('https://servicodados.ibge.gov.br/api/v1/localidades/estados').then(response =>{ const ufInitials = response.data.map(uf => uf.sigla); setUfs(ufInitials); }) }) return (

) }; export default CreatePoint;
